properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 8:22PM EST until January 14 at 1:51AM EST by NWS Louisville KY
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky...

Green River at Woodbury

affecting the following counties in Kentucky...Butler...Warren.

.Heavy rain over the last several days has caused the river to rise.

The National Weather Service in Louisville KY has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Green River at Woodbury.
* from late tonight to late Monday night.
* At 8:00 PM Sunday the stage was 25.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 26.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by after midnight Monday and
continue to rise to near 26.3 feet by Monday morning. The river
will fall below flood stage by Monday evening.
* Impact...At 26.0 feet...KY 403 at James McKinney Bridge floods.
Water overflows lock wall.
* Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 26.6
feet on Mar 11 2019.
properties.instruction:
If you are affected by these crests take any necessary actions.
Additional information is available at
water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lmk.
